Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

notes: 材資館407生醫材料實驗室上課

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.zh: 平面顯示器原理與技術
name.en: Principle of Flat Panel Display Technology

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: Introduction of the theories and technologies of flat panel display and the future development of flat display technology.  1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。五、相變化動力學簡介。六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en: 1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application2.One component system3.Two component system4.Three component system。5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

name.zh: 界面活性劑原理與應用
name.en: The Principles and Applications of Surface Active Agent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
description.en: This course will introduce (1)characteristic features of surfactant and its preparation (2)adsorption of surface-active agents at interfaces (3)micelle formation by surfactants (4)modification of surface properties by surfactants (5)foaming and antifoaming by aqueous solutions of surfactants.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
description.en: The course aims to advance students' knowledge of the physics underlying different applied geophysical methods and how the methods are used for exploration, geotechnics, and characterization.  We will cover the theories and modeling techniques of seismic refraction, seismic reflection, heat flow, gravity, and magnetics methods.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

name.en: Special Topics on Mechanical & Electric engineering   (一)

description.zh: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course, conducted by several professors from the Institute of. Mechanical & Electric Engineering introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of mechatronics and advanced technology. The topics covered mainly lie in areas of automation technology, mechatronics, advanced manufacturing technology, air conditioning & refrigeration engineering and vehicle engineering.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

notes: 上課教室:工程學院研討室(1教2樓)

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 永續規劃設計理論研究
name.en: Theoretical Research on Sustainable Planning and Design

description.zh: 永續規劃設計是格外需要跨學術領域訓練的過程，因此本課程將提供下列設計專業者必須學習的訓練：1.	成長與浪費的觀念2.	生態解法的設計3.	永續文化與景觀的設計4.	以設計體現與強化價值的規劃5.	複合化社會系統的設計6.	社區營造與健康的設計7.	省能、輕量、減廢的設計8.	生產力、土地與交通效能9.	營建與環境法規10.	規劃、設計與方案評估
description.en: Sustainable planning and design is an exceptionally transdisciplinary process. Therefore, This course will provide the following trainings which design professionals must learned:1.	The concepts of growth and waste2.	Designing for eco-solutions3.	Permaculture and landscape design4.	Values embodied in and reinforces by design5.	Design within complex social systems6.	Design for community building and health7.	Design with less energy, materials and waste8.	Productivity, land and transport efficiency9.	Construction and environmental regulation10.	Planning, design and project assessment

description.zh: 1. 授課目的： 現代都市規劃與建築設計除了永續環境生態之議題外，影響人體最鉅者莫過於健康環境議題，尤其在 SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism等事件之後。本課程之目的即在於傳述健康環境概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容，以培養學生健康建築之檢測、診斷、規劃、設計與施工能力。2. 授課內容： 由基本永續都市中，各項健康議題、技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而探討其實務應用。3. 作業練習： 本學期藉由專題檢測與實驗操作、改善方案設計、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用操作能力，以利學生認識健康指標及其設計應用之整體關聯性，進而建立其健康建築規劃設計能力。
description.en: After the incidents of SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism etc., the most important issues would be the healthy problem in built environment besides sustainability of urban planning and building design. The purposes of this course are, based on empirical survey and experiment, special topics on healthy buildings such as, aerosols, microorganism, electromagnetic waves, sound etc. would be studied. Results for hypothetical approaches, technical solutions and improving measures are to propose, so that the concept and logic for healthy buildings would established.

description.zh: 候補
description.en: 候補

description.zh: 講授設計研究領域中之理論與實務，包括美學、人機介面、社會文化、科技發展、及環境等議題。本課程之目標在於呈現各種設計研究的特質與限制，進而引導研究生以分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考架構理論，做為設計研究之基礎。
description.en: Lecture on theories and practice of contemporary design research including fields of aesthetics, ergonomics, sociology, development of science and technology, and environmental issue. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research potential and conduct individuals through rigor process of strategic literature research, in which, method of analysis, criticism, reconstruction and generalization will be employed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育哲學架構，課程包 括三大部份，第一部份探討哲學的基本課題與哲學和教育的關係；第 二部份探討傳統和當代教育哲學所面對的基本問題，以及它們對教育 實務所能提供的回應之道；第三部份涉及發展個人教育哲學之重要，方法與推行時可能受到的挑戰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The goal of this course is to offer a conceptual frame of educational philosophy. The course is divided into three sections. Part I deals with basic issuers in philosophy and the relationship between philosophy and education. Part II is a survey of how traditional and modern philosophies have faced the basic philosophic issuers, and the alternatives they have developed for educational practice. Part III discusses the need for developing personal philosophy of education, some ways of building such a philosophy, and some of the challenges involved in implementing that philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關教育心理學的系統知識使其在未來從事教職時，具最有效的方法瞭解，敘述，預測及其學生的行為並從而採用最佳的教學方式，以達成教育目標。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the systematic knowledge of educational psychology to the students who have the willingness to be teachers. It presents the students with the basic psychology theories of instructional process; mental-physical development; the principles of learning and instruction; the learning about motor and skill, words and concepts; cultivating of thinking and creative; motivation and interest in instructing process; the measurement of individual difference; proper instructions against differently mental students; teacher-student relationship and students behaviors; instruction evaluation; mental hygiene and health in school. After finishing this course, the persons will get the most effective methods to understand, describe or predict their students behaviors, and can choose the best instructional ways achieve the educational goal, when they become teachers in the future.

name.en: Materials and Methods of Teaching for Various Subjects

description.zh: 不同的課目有著不同的教學方式，及教學原理。本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生對其專業科目的特殊教學法有進一步的了解。使得在任教此一科目時能運用更適切適當的教學方法提高學生學習的效果。
description.en: There are different teaching styles and teaching theories for different courses. The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

description.zh: 讓學生對教育有總合而初步的認識，以培養初任教師的共信與共識。以及引起學生研習教育的興趣，以奠定其將來繼續研習之基礎。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers a introduction to students about the idea of general education and gives students some motivation about learning how to teach.

description.zh: 學生探討主題可包含當前中等教育重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of major research regarding contemporary trends, issues and programs in secondary education. Students expected to select contemporary issues of secondary education into their current research interests. Discussion, case study and reporting are required.

description.zh: 「輔導工作是所有教育工作者的責任」。任何人都會遭遇問題，成長中的學生尤其有各式各樣的問題。身為人師，在教學過程中應輔導學生解決問題，以培養健康進取，有能力解決問題，適應環境的學生為己任。在本課程的目標即在透過對青春期挫折徵候的了瞭以及學者心理分析輔導法、個體心理輔導法、存在主義輔導法、理情輔導法、認知輔導法、溝通分析輔導法、行為輔導法等輔導理論，並配合實例分析使未來之教育工作人員獲得工作時的輔導知能以及培養輔導工作的志趣。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: When teaching, the teachers should keep in mind the duty to guide their students to overcome the frustration or to solve the difficult problems as to nurture the students to be healthy, positive, with their own abilities to overcome difficulties and to be apt to their environment. The object of this subject is to help the students with the willingness to be teachers get the knowledge and abilities of guidance on their teaching in the future, and develop their willingness and interests of guidance. This course presents the students with the units including to understand the symptom of adolescent frustration, the method of person-center approach, the method of rational-emotive therapy, the method of cognitive guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance, the method of behavior guidance. In addition, this course also introduces many practical cases so that the students can more effectively study the relative theories.

description.zh: （一）瞭解青少年發展的意義與內涵。（二）瞭解青少年發展理論及實務，（三）培養青少年發展與輔導的基本能力。課程內容包括：青少年的定義與內涵、青少年發展的理論模式、青少年的生理發展與輔導、青少年的智能發展與輔導、青少年的社會化發展與輔導、青少年的情緒發展與輔導、青少年的人格發展與輔導、青少年的道德發展與輔導、青少年的生涯發展與輔導。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition and essence of adolescence development, (1) understands the theory and application of adolescence development, (3) cultivate the fundamental capability of adolescence development and guidance. It covers the definition and essence of adolescence, theory of adolescence development and guidance, physiology development and guidance of adolescence, intelligence development and guidance of adolescence, socialization development and guidance of adolescence, emotion development and guidance of adolescence, personality development and guidance of adolescence, moral development and guidance of adolescence, and career development and guidance of adolescence.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在增進擔任中等學校自然與生活科技領域課程之教師，瞭解生活科技教育理論、探討生活科技內涵、瞭解九年一貫自然與生活科技學習領域課程綱要、培養生活科技相關知能素養。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to： (1) understand the theory of living technology education. (2) explore the essence of living technology. (3) understand the grade 1-9 curriculum guidelines of science and living technology areas. (4) cultivate the knowledge and skills of living technology.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下:(一)充實學生各種激發快樂學習、健康成長的學識，以培養適任的優良教師；（二）提供學生班級教學及班級導師工作的實務經驗與做法，使具備有效處理教學與班級事務的良好技能﹔(三)奠定學生熱忱積極經營班級之理念，養成學生教育專業精神，使其在從事教育工作時能發揮愛心與熱忱來欣賞及參與班級的各種活動。 本課程的內容涵蓋班級經營的學理基礎;班級經營的目標、計劃與評鑑;教學、行政之經營;導師的任務與素養;學生自治活動、教學情境佈置;班級氣氛與學習;班級的評量設計;有關安置、生活、學習、行為等方面的問題與對策等 本課程利用講授法、小組討論法、發表法等方式進行教學，盡量在教學過程中探討教室內各種發生的狀況尋求最佳解決方式，且進行發展積極、和諧、快樂的師生互動模式之探討以利學生在未來擔任教師時能駕輕就熟於班級經營工作，而達成本課程之目標 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(備註：本資料係由本校各教學單位、教務處課務組、進修部教務組、進修學院教務組及計網中心所共同提供！本資料僅供參考，正式資料仍以教務處、進修部、進修學院所公佈之書面資料為準。
本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生能夠利用多媒體電腦做為教學上的輔助工具。課程的重點主要在介紹 MS Office PowerPoint 應用程式在教學上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students know the computer software will do a lot of help in the future teaching. MS Office PowerPoint will be the main software introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
description.en: This course is designated to enhance students' English ability so that they can perform well in any future programme of study. The course consists of two main elements: 1. EFL listening, speaking, reading, and writing, 2. self study skills.

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: A班,每星期一、二18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics.  Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

name.zh: 研究方法--文化研究應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).本課程以人文學科領域通用的MLA系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide.  Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 德國哲學家Wilhelm Schapp曾說過:「我們人類永遠糾纏在各種故事中」。我們就在這些糾結中建立了各種觀念：對與錯、成功與失敗、真實與虛假。其實這些指引我們人生的故事就具備了敘事的結構。人們彼此訴說故事，不但是以此為樂，更重要的是藉著敘事得以在社群中取得一席發聲之地，進而在更廣大的脈絡中為自己的社群找到定位。敘事的特質就是流動迅速，這也就成了說故事最基本的特點。雖然詩或小說的語意在轉譯成不同文化或媒介時，很容易失落，但是它們內在的敘事模式顯然比較固定恆久，而且無關乎這些詩或小說是事實或是虛構。但是敘事模式究竟有些什麼不變的元素? 例如電影「麻雀變鳳凰」或是黛安娜王妃的傳記，其中的基本敘事模式是否就是灰姑娘的翻版?本課程將探討敘事學的基本策略，教導學生以此作為分析故事的基本工具 (Barthes, Chatman, Genette, Herman);同時也要介紹相關的理論，討論敘事在人類經驗中的重要性 (Bruner, Ricoeur)。最後我們會將閱讀所得到的啟發和觀點，應用詮釋各式各樣的媒體敘事，包括小說、新聞報導、電影、畫片和圖像小說。
description.en: "We humans are always entangled in stories," writes the German philosopher Wilhelm Schapp. It is from this entanglement that we draw our notions of right or wrong, success or failure, truth and lie. The categories by means of which we navigate our lives are narrative in nature. We tell each other stories not only in order to entertain ourselves, but also to claim a place within the communities of which we are a part and to define the place of these communities within the larger scheme of things.One indicator of the fundamental character of story-telling is the fact that narratives travel so easily - while the semantic nuances of a poem or a novel are easily lost in the process of translating them into a different culture or a different medium, the underlying narrative forms appear to be not only more durable, but also indifferent to the distinction between fact and fiction. description.zh: 本科目以跨學科多媒體的方式來探討不同媒介(與文類)的作品之間如何存在著啟發創意的連鎖反應，與創意激盪的引力關係，並探索何以同一時代不同的藝術形式之間展現出類似的創意主題與手法，進而形成時代的文化特色。以荷蘭畫家維米爾(Vermeer)的名畫「戴珍珠耳環的少女」為例，此畫作激發了作家歇維理(Chevalier)無限的想像空間而寫了一部同名小說，試圖去解釋畫作背後之奧秘。接著，受小說的激發，一部同名電影應運而生，把小說情節加以改編，並參考維米爾其它畫作, 試圖重現原畫創作時畫家個人、家庭與時代風采。這一連串連鎖激盪之下，不同媒介與文類的新作品出爐了，各有特色，而且彼此間還有相互連結和彼此評論的關係。有時候，類似的連結(可能在主題或手法上)普遍地出現在同一時代不同的藝術形式之間，這說明了此一連鎖與創意激盪的關係如何大規模地造成文化思想潮流與大眾流行文化。以「解構(後結構)思潮」為例，原本在哲學領域獨樹一格，進入文學批評理論領域後成為顯學，進而影響藝術評論與創作理念。後來更傳播至建築理論與設計，造成「解構建築」之流行與歪斜屋宇之誕生。儼然成為「後現代文化」的註冊商標。這一文化傳播的現象乃依賴前述之(1)啟發創意的連鎖反應，
description.en: This course adopts an interdisciplinary and inter-medium approach to understanding the cultural creation of a text.  The target is to investigate how a cultural/literary text is created in relation to, and in response to, another text in different media/genres, and how this "chain reaction" or "web of influences" displays a rippling effect that travels across the boundaries among painting, music, architecture, literature, and film.  For example, Vermeer's painting entitled "The Girl with a Pearl Earring" inspires the creation of a novel by Tracy Chevalier, which in turn facilitates the creation of a movie also with the same title. The case is the same with the musical piece of "Gloomy Sunday" which inspires the creation of many verbal/visual/audio art forms under the same title and even makes a social impact on increasing suicide cases.  These related texts form a "constellation" of "cycle," and certain ideas are so powerful that they permeate many genres/media at the same period of ti

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidify the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetic, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters, and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 使學生認知測量是各項工程建設的一項重要基礎性先行的工作，使能適應各項測量外業觀測、內業計算及繪圖等作業。課程概要如下：1)測量之基本概念、(2)各種測量儀器的認識與使用、(3)控制測量（括三角、三邊導線高程等)之施測方法及計算、(4)地形圖及地籍圖之測及應用、(5)各項工程放樣測量。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 配合測量學之講授，作相互之印證，以期融會貫通，落實提昇測量教學之效果。課程概要：(1)各項儀器之使用實習、(2)距離、高程、角度測量實習、(3)控制測量實習、(4) 地形測量實習、(5) 定線實習。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授Unix指令、基礎HTML、網頁編製、及Fortran 90/95程式語言，包括電腦運作概念、程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
description.en: This is the first programming language course for freshmen that replaces the introductory programming course formerly offered by the department.  The topics covered in this course includes Unix commands, basic introduction to HTML and web pages, basic computer operation, Fortran architecture, branching structures, loops manipulation, input/output concepts, arrays manipulation, characters manipulation, and procedure calls.

description.zh: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
description.en: Introduction to the principles of chemistry and properties of matter, which are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. Individual topics include gas, stoichiometry, atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the states of matter, energy relation, acid-base theory and oxidation-reduction reactions, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, nuclear chemistry.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 本課程以計算機硬體及軟體之基本介紹為始，逐步引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。
description.en: To familiarize the student with basic computer programming concepts. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computer solutions, as well as an introduction into the syntax and semantics of the C and C++ programming language. An important objective of the course is to present effective methods of program design using modular construction and structured programming notions of sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

description.zh: 1.介紹視窗程式語言及其物件導向特性 2.基礎視窗程式設計 3.動態連結程式庫之程式設計 4.視窗圖形使用者界面設計 5.視窗I/O界面設計 6.多媒體程式寫作 7.DDE與OLE之程式設計 8.視窗多執行緒之程式設計
description.en: 1. introduction to windows programming language and its object-oriented design 2. fundamental windows programming 3. programming with dynamic-link library 4. design of windows GUI 5. windows I/O interface programming 6. multi-media programming 7. programming with DDE and OLE 8. windows programming with multithreads.

name.zh: 行動網際網路技術與應用

description.zh: 本課程的目的在協助學生了解新興及行動通訊產業的技術基礎及未來應用發展。希望藉由課程討論激發與課人員探討無線科技能產生的新應用並進一步以小組專案方式擬出行動應用可行的商業方案。主要課題包括：1.無線通訊系統演進簡介2.無線/公眾區域網路技術與應用3.行動通訊系統技GSM/GPRS/3G 4.行動加值服務應用與規劃5.加值服務商業模式探討6.行動商務及行動付款服務規劃7.行動定位服務探討8.第三代行動通訊概況
description.en: This course focused at the Mobile Internet both Technology and Application related topics. It is designed to bridge the GAP between Internet and Mobile communication (both Wireless LAN & Cellular communication) using system architecture and value-added services examples. The discussion topics will include: 1.Overview of Wireless Communication Systems 2.[Public]Wireless LAN Technology/System Architecture & Applications 3.Introduction of Cellular communication: GSM/GPRS/3G 4.Mobile Value-Added Service (M-VAS) Planning 5.M-VAS Business Model discussion 6.Mobile Commerce & Mobile Payment 7.Mobile Positioning System & Location-Base Service 8. 3G Service NOW

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.zh: 本課程介紹在數位影像處理領域中會使用到的基本觀念與技術. 數位影像處理有非常多重要的應用, 如: 影像內容改善, 工業檢測, 機器知覺等. 課程內容包括: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing (IP). Digital Image Processing has many important applications, for example, image contents improvement, industrial inspection, machine perception. The outline of this course is: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing 6. Image compression 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and description 9. Recognition and interpretation.

description.zh: 本課程探討物件導向程式設計的原理, 語言與環境, 基本設計方法,  並以課程專題製作的方式使學者熟稔物件導向觀念. 課程內容: 物件與類別, 訊息傳遞, 繼承, 組合, 虛擬方法與多型性, 模板, 物件導向語言與環境, 專題
description.en: This course investigates the principles, languages and environments, and elementary design methods for object-oriented programming.  Students will be required to complete a term programming project. Course contents: Class and object, message passing, inheritance, composition, virtual methods and polymorphism, templates,  object-oriented languages and environments, term project.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

notes: 博班(暫定綜科第三演講廳)

Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討下列音訊編碼技術：MP-3,Dolby AC-3及DTS。課程內容涵蓋下列項目:1.複習數位訊號處理 2.CD片聲音還原 3.多相位分解 4.次頻段音訊編碼5.個案研究:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC,AC-3及DTS 6.MPEG-4合成音樂簡介
description.en: 1.This course mainly discusses various audio coding schemes such as MP-3,Dolby AC-3,and DTS.Topics covered in the course include:1.Review of digital signal processing 2.Audio reproduction from CD3.Polyphase decomposition4.Subband coding of audio signals5.Psychoacoustic models6.Case studies:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC, AC-3,and DTS7.Introduction to Synthetic audio in MPEG-4

description.zh: 本課程讓學習者熟悉電子商務之相關技術、議題、及應用，主要內容包括：電子商務的網路基礎建設，網路安全與防火牆，電子商務與全球資訊網，電子交易與電子付款系統，internet協定組，軟體代理人，行動計算基本原理，企業內網路及企業間網路，數位版權。
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the techniques, issues, and applications of electronic commerce. Course content includes the infrastructure of e-commerce, network security and firewall, e-commerce and WWW, e-trade and e-payment, internet protocols, software agent, principles of mobile computing, intranet and extranet, digital copyright.

notes: 大四、研究所合開,計網中心教室

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 本課程先從學理上探討科技工程與人文倫理的關連，鼓勵同學廣泛閱讀，多方面吸收新知識，進而對各種不同的情境與個案，提出客觀的分析與評價，並建立主觀上認知。課程上針對實用的主題，也會邀請學有專精有實務應用的賢達人士，提供知識與經驗的交流。課堂上除了知識的講授，強調師生之間的討論，也成立專題學習小組，以兩三人為一個專題學習小組，以案例分析的方式，促進同學之間的相互學習，發揮團隊合作的精神。專題報告要選擇實用的議題，學術討論外，力求實務化與生活化，盼望藉著同學的專題報告，提昇同學的溝通表達的能力和研究評析的能力，以及判斷抉擇的能力。
description.en: One of the most current issues in engineering is its involvement with the problems of ethics and values. Engineering ethics is attracting increasing interest among colleges of engineering and universities throughout the well-developed high-tech countries. The increasing concern for the ethic and value dimensions of engineering is, at least in part, a result of the attention that the media has given to cases such as the Challenger disaster of the NASA, the public safety of poor infrastructure, the collapse of buildings in the 921 earthquake, and the environmental pollution due to oil spill. As a response to this concern, a new discipline, engineering ethics, is emerging for undergraduate engineering courses. This discipline will doubtless take its place alongside such well-established fields as medical ethics, business ethics, and legal ethics. This course aims to help engineering students gain a broad understanding of professionalism and its vital contribution to society

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 此課程為量子力學之簡介。在課程中，我們試圖從原子物理、分子物理及固態物理等各領域來說明、瞭解量子力學的重要性。在所舉之例中，我們只強調量子的現象，對量子力學本身之數並未特別做仔細、深入的計算。由量子力學所得的結果都與古典理論所得的結果做比較，以培養學生對量子的直覺。本課程的目的不只是處理數學式子與相關現象，同時也希望引領學生能進一步的運用在其專業領域。
description.en: This course is an introduction to formal quantum mechanics. It is to provide illustrations of quantum mechanics by taking many examples from different fields such as atomic physics, molecular physics and solid state physics. In these examples we concentrate on the quantum mechanical aspect of phenomena, often neglecting specific details. Whenever possible, the quantum mechanical results are compared with the classical ones in order to help the students develop his intuition concerning quantum mechanical effects. The intent, however is to treat in the course not only the basic formalism and related phenomena, but to take the student a step further to a consideration of generic and important application.

name.en: Theory and Applications of Optical Fibers

description.zh: 光纖是光纖通信及光電應用中非常重要的元件。在本課程裡，我們將先介紹光的基本概念、然後是光纖材料與製成技術、光纖結構與傳播原理、傳播特性與分析、非線性特性、和有關的系統與應用。其中所討論的標題包含：(1)電磁波傳播之回顧(2)平板波導(3)單階折射率光纖(4)光纖的特性與分析(5)漸階折射率光纖(6)光纖於光纖通信之應用(7)光纖感測器之介紹(8)光纖光柵之介紹
description.en: This course provides the basics of light propagation in fibers; these include fundamental waveguiding concepts, the influence of various fiber structures, material properties of light transmission, and related devices and systems. The following topics will be introduced:(1) Review of electromagnetic wave propagation, (2) Slab waveguides, (3) Optical fibers with single-step index profiles, (4) Loss and dispersion in optical fiber, (5) Nonlinear effects in fiber (I), (6) Nonlinear effects in fiber (II), (7) Introduction to fiber sensors, (8) Introduction to fiber gratings.

description.zh: 高科技之技術創新與其智慧財產管理系統（簡稱：技術財產管理系統）之內涵包括三個階段：技術管理、創新管理與技術產權管理。重複第一與第二階段，以進一步獲得更新與更有價值的技術與專利，來豐富與擴大經營自己的技術與專利產業；即形成一動態的技術資產管理系統。
description.en: The connotation of TPMS including three stages: Technical management, innovation management and technical property right management. It Duplicates first with the second stage, by further obtains the renewal with a more valuable technology and the patent, enriches with the expansion manages own technology and the patent industry; Namely forms a dynamic technical property management system management system.

description.zh: 基因體學工程學，是結合分子生物技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於分子生物技術的快速發展，DNA定序的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。基因體學工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Genomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from molecular biology and computational technology. Molecular biology techniques in high speed screening such as DNA sequencing have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Genomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

name.en: Project Management of Construction and Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 營建與防災工程均為特定而單一的專案工程，本課程應用專案管理之機制，舉例對營建與防災工程進行應用分析與探討；以幫助學生習得專案管理知識、增加就業的競爭力，並可同步規劃取得國際認可之專案管理認證資格。原則上，課程內容為：第一章營建與防災工程專案概念，第二章專案管理能力與角色責任，第三章專案管理組織、架構、流程及管理方法，第四章大型專案與組合管理，第五章專案管理之規劃，第六章專案管理執行與控制，第七章專案管理之結束與回饋。
description.en: Construction and disaster prevention engineering are special and specific project. This course will apply and discuss the illustration of mechanism with project management into construction and disaster prevention engineering. From this course, student can learn the knowledge of project management, increase competition ability and take the accreditation of international project management. Course contents includes:1.Introduction of construction, disaster prevention and project management,2.Capability and responsibility of project management,3.Organization and process of project management,4.Large project management and integration,5.Planning of project management,6.Exclusion and control of project management,7.Ending and feedback of project management.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 在工程科學方面最錯綜複雜的問題之一是它對人類社會的影響力，本課程先從學理上探討科技工程與人文倫理的關連，鼓勵同學廣泛閱讀，多方面吸收新知識，進而對各種不同的情境與個案，提出客觀的分析與評價，並建立主觀上認知。更結合各方面的專業領域例如醫療概念、商業道德，和法律概念來強調日新月異新開發的工程技術下不能被忽略倫理道德。並藉由此課程盼望同學對專業化知識帶及社會的進步與安定有更寬廣認知。
description.en: One of the most complicated issues in engineering is its impact to human society. Engineering ethics is attracting increasing interest throughout many well-developed industrial countries. As a response to this concern, a new discipline, engineering ethics, is emerging for undergraduate engineering courses. This discipline combined well-established fields such as medical ethics, business ethics, and legal ethics, with emphasis on ethical issues raised by new advanced technology in engineering. The major aim of the course is to help engineering students gain a broad understanding of professionalism and its vital contribution to society.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現代化企業和組織整合，主要目標是管理面與科技面的創造，以及現代資訊科技管理與企業整合。企業為了追求更高效率與更高效能的價值鏈而快速地轉變成虛擬企業。以階層命令為主的管理模式與控制結構，不論是企業內部還是企業外部，皆已改變。在企業流程內的資訊系統也開始重新規劃，企業對企業 (B2B) 電子商務，或是稱為電子化企業，也已經變成企業生存最主要的要素。這門課將會教導上述內容，並把焦點放在所有這些相關議題，從策略規劃到現代化科技應用整合 (EAI) 等複雜的電子商務流程管理。這門課著重在報告以及創造力的訓練。在課程中，學生將會被分成若干專案小組以完成一個專案或是一份與電子化企業整合技術或工具相關的報告或應用，還有一些個案研讀。
description.en: This course introduces the modern integrated enterprises and organization. The focus is on the managerial and technical aspects of creating and managing modern IT enabled and integrated enterprises. It is clear that enterprises have been in rapid transition toward virtual enterprises with value chain integration for high efficiency and efficacy. Management styles based on hierarchical command and control structures have been challenged both within an enterprise and among enterprises.  Information systems are being realigned around business processes, and business-to-business (B2B) electronic commerce (or some call it "e-business") has become a key competence that business cannot survive without. This course provides such understanding by focusing on all aspects of managing this complex e-business oprocesses, from strategic planning to the technologies of modern enterprise application integration (EAI). The course stresses the importance of hands-on and creative training. Students will

description.zh: 國際間基於永續發展之目標，及建立循環型體系之趨勢，各國均選擇適當區域來推動生態化工業，促進產業間投入與產出面之關聯性連結，進而從循環型產業擴展至生態都市及循環型城鄉與社會。本課程將配合國內環保科技園區推展現況及實際須求來授課, 內容包括國際循環型產業, 生態工業系統原則, 運作效益, 清潔生產,廢棄物資源化網路架構等。
description.en: Establishing Ecology Industry and recycle-oriented society has been a current trend in the world.  Starting from building up the linkage ofthe inputs and outputs between Industries, recycle-oriented concepts can be further expended to build eco-town and eco-city. The main purpose of  this course is to learn the Industrial Ecology, principals of Eco-Industrial Park, Pollution Prevention, Cleaner Production, Waste recycle and resource recovery networks, etc.

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 數值分析在結構工程上之應用
name.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical Analysis

description.zh: 電腦基本知識，中英文文書處理系統的基本設計理念與現有系統實習，電腦工作底稿功能架構說明及應用實習，資料庫管理系統基本觀念，工程資訊管理系統基本觀念，資料庫設計及資料庫軟體系統使用練習，簡易型之統計繪圖軟體及工程應用實例，其他現代電腦科技發展與其在結構上之應用個案。
description.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical AnalysisThe application of computer about civil engineering, such as officials Dispatch to handle in Chinese and English, the software of drawings and using software of data base etc.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 介紹有機化學原理及應用於材料科學之場合
description.en: introduction to organic chemistry of materials

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。
description.en: The course includes: 1.Introduction of ceramics manufacturing : Including powder manufacturing , forming method, additive and sintering practice. 2.Material fundamental concept: Such as ceramic crystal structure, diffusion, defective chemistry. 3.Structural ceramic characteristics and detective method. 4.Electrical ceramic characters:including dielectricity,ferro-electricity,semi-conductivity, anddetective methods. 5.Magnetic material characteristics and detection.

description.zh: 介紹污染源及防治措施，內容包括概述、污染物種類及影響、污染防治方法及主要工業污染之防治。
description.en: Introduction to Industrial Pollution Control.

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他

description.zh: 以專題研究方式訓練學生獨立企劃,分析,評斷,歸納及創新思考的能力.並藉由對生活型態,生活行為,生活需求,家具與室內空間相關性等問題之深入探討,實際演練設計之過程及熟練家具與室內設計之手法.
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

notes: 分小組教學，設計館建築系3樓討論室支援部份授課

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

name.zh: 生醫材料及表面分析之檢測原理
name.en: Fundamentals and Practice of Biomaterials Surface Analysis

description.zh: 本課程內容以材料結構性質以及表面分析兩大基礎為出發點，講授生醫材料關鍵性質之檢測原理與方法。課程設計首重講述檢測方法之基礎科學:材料力學與原子鍵結理論將架構出生醫材料性質檢測之基礎科學，而表面化學與物理化學是生醫材料表面分析方法之關鍵基礎科學。在簡述關鍵基礎科學單元後，進一步根據不同類型之檢測技術作深入講解，內容包括原理、使用技術、應用實例三大方向，尤其針對該技術在生醫材料應用上之重要性做連結性之介紹。課程實施方法上，校內老師將著重在基礎科學理論之講述，另安排業界專家針對使用技術作較為詳盡之介紹，而由醫學工程專家配合學校老師針對應用實例做個案討論。在完整訓練目的之設計下，另有實驗課程，以訓練學生之實作經驗與能力。
description.en: The course is designed based on the materials properties and surface analysis principles. Te purpose is to teach the measurement methods for biomaterials analysis. The critical curriculum includes materials mechanics, surface science, biomaterials. Further applications on biomaterials, the experimental curriculum is designed to develop students' hands on skills on biomaterials and surface analysis applications.especially the surface interactions with cells and tissues will be focused. In addition to the regular lectures,

notes: 科學人才培育銜接計畫

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程大學部畢業生。生物程序是應用工程原理，採用生物催化劑來設計、發展化工程序。這些程序有許多應用，諸如生產化合物或分解破壞有害的物質。工程的知識，尤其是化學工程是成功拓展地生物程序所必須的。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledge of bioprocess to traditional chemical engineers. Bioprocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze processes using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The knowledge of the engineering, particularly the chemical engineering, will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 在目前資訊爆增的社會中，從事教學工作確實不是一件很輕鬆的工作。當今國內的教育方式是大量的資訊必須利用有限的時間，在指定的空間內，傳播給必須接受者。此一工作勢必要借助於相當妥善的媒介或手段才能做到。因此，從事教育工作者如何研究和運用適切的媒體來教學已成為不可忽視的課題。本課程的重點在介紹教學媒體的涵義、分類與功能、如何進行教學傳播，以及媒體教學的基本理論。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 目前國內教育制度僅為三成的學生而設計，忽略了多數七成技職學生的教育需求，造成今日升學風氣瀰漫，學校未能正常教學，以及社會普遍以文憑用人之不當偏差現象。本課程即針對以下未來技職教育的重點以下未來技職教育的重點做概況性的介紹:1.彈性調整技職學制，暢通學生進修管道。2.落實職業証照制度，提昇技職教育尊嚴。3.規劃高職免試入學方案，紓解國中生升學壓力。4.試辦綜合高中課程實驗，輔導技職教育精緻發展。5.加強技職教育宣導，建立正確職業價值觀念。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers a introduction about technical and vocational education as following (a) flexible adjustment the system of technical and vocational education and making the student learning smoothly in technical and vocational education (b) emphasizing vocation license system; giving more respect to technical and vocational education .(c) planning about no examination into middle-vocational school to relive the pressure of studying (d) try the variety middle school course and make the technical and vocational education better. (f) emphasis the technical and vocational education advertisement, establish the right idea about technical and vocational education.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

description.zh: 本課程為銜接"相平衡"之進階課程，使學生學習在晶體及材料合成、製程及應用，甚至回收時，所發生之擴散及非擴散相變現象與機制；探討成核與成長機制及其反應速率；並探討非平衡相變在實際材料冶煉、合成及加工製程上之應用。課程大綱1.	相圖及非平衡相2.	擴散理論3.	晶體界面與微結構4.	凝固---成核與成長機制及速率5.	固相中之擴散相變6.	非擴散相變7.	燒結現象與理論
description.en: 1.	Phase diagrams and nonequilibrium phases2.	Diffusion3.	Crystal Interfaces and microstructure4.	Solidification-nucleation rate and growth rate5.	Diffusional transformations in solids6.	Diffusionless transformations7.	sintering phenomena and theory

name.zh: 電腦輔助機構運動分析

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦輔助工程分析軟體ADAMS如何應用於機構之運動分析，內容包括模型建構、虛擬測試、結果驗證、敏感度分析、最佳化設計，以及車輛機構之應用分析。
description.en: The course aims to give an understanding of how computer aided engineering software, ADAMS, is used to analyze the kinematic behavior of mechanism. Contents in the course include model building, virtual testing, result validating, sensitivity analysis and optimum design, and also the application of vehicle mechanism analysis.
