description.zh: 分析當前技職校院內在、外在教育環境的衝擊，從理論及個案探討層面比較技職校院組織變革、經營模式、領導型態。
description.en: To analyze the changing of internal and external environment that impacts on technological colleges currently, and to discuss and compare ogranizational invovation models, the management and leadership styles among technological colleges from both theoretical and paractical aspects.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為參與校外合作車廠所提供之訓練 , 觀摩學習專業汽車維修服務工廠之實際運作。
description.en: Participation in one of the corporative automobile service shops , learning and practice the real operation of the auto service shop

notes: 限已安排好車廠者於2008年暑期實習

name.en: Fundamental and Applications of Online Process

description.zh: 1.製程監測介紹2.監測系統簡介3.基礎光學原理4.基礎聲學原理5.電漿基礎原理6.光學於線上監測之應用7.聲學於線上監測之應用8.線上電漿監測之應用9.線上監測系統整合10.網路線上即時監測
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction of online process monitoring. Fundamentals and applications of various process monitoring subsystems will be introduced. Practical application examples will be demonstrated as well. The course syllabus include: 1. Introduction to online process monitoring, 2. monitoring system, 3. optics, 4. acoustics, 5. plasma, 6. optics applied in online process monitoring, 7. acoustics applied in online process monitoring, 8. system integration for online process monitoring, 9. network applications in process monitoring.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於介紹移動機器人學的基礎知識，包括：輪式機器人的移動學、運動學與動力學、移動機器人的感測、感知、與認知方法等。本課程同時簡介移動機器人的系統架構、軟/硬體設計、地圖建立、定位與導航的基本概念。透過本課程的解說可使同學們瞭解如何設計並控制移動式機器人；並使研究所的同學具有分析與評估移動式機器人研究的背景知識。
description.en: This course focuses on the fundamentals of mobile robotics including locomotion of wheeled robots, kinematics and dynamics, sensory, perceptual and cognitive methods of mobile robots. System architecture, hardware and software design, and the concept of map building, localization, and navigation are also introduced in the course. We hope this course can help students understand how to design and control mobile robots, and can empower graduate students to have background knowledge to evaluate research results for mobile robots.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意工程最佳化方法導論，線性規畫法，非線性規畫法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規畫法介紹，機械元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods,Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization,Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Technigues,Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

description.zh: 介紹如何開發『資料庫』的應用軟體以結合機械工程應用。內容含：Ubuntu Linux電腦作業系統，Apache伺服，MySQL資料庫伺服，HTML與PHP電腦程式語言，範例剖析。
description.en: The course aims to introduce the applications of database, further to combine them with the applications of mechanical engineering. The introduced contents consist of the following points:1.Ubuntu Linux, 2.Apache Server, 3.MySQL Server, 4.HTML and PHP, 5.Examples Explainations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 介紹如何以原案分析方法, 藉由設計口語、圖面、及行為等資料來解析設計思考之心智活動, 以探討設計行為之知識表達與團隊互動。
description.en: Introduction to the methodology of protocol analysis and its application to design behavior. It is aimed to explore the design knowledge representation and design group interaction by a further understanding of the mental activities of design through the analysis of verbal, graphic, and behavioral protocol data of design.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導；對流原理，強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式；輻射熱傳遞；凝結與沸騰；熱交換器；熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction- Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

name.en: Vector Control of Induction Machine Drives

description.zh: 1) 電磁能量轉換2) 感應馬達運轉原理3) 變頻控制4) 複數向量模式5) 向量控制原理6) 三相交流電流控制7) PWM轉換器原理8) 感應馬達參數量測9) 弱磁控制原理
description.en: 1) Electromagnetic energy conversion2) Induction machine theory3) Variable voltage variable frequency control4) Complex vector model5) Principle of vector control6) Three-phase current control7) DC-AC PWM converter8) IM Parameter measurement and estimation9) Field weakening control

description.zh: 1. 類神經網路簡介2. 層狀認知網路3. 競爭學習神經網路4. 適應共振理論5. 聯想記憶6. 特徵萃取
description.en: Topics that are covered in the course include:"	Bayesian decision theory: the theoretical statistical basis for recognition based on Bayes theorem from probability"	Maximum-likelihood and Bayesian parameter estimation: parameters of probability density functions"	Nonparametric techniques: Parzen window, k-nearest neighbor"	Linear discriminant functions: gradient descent, relaxation, minimum squared-error procedures such as LMS, and support vector machines"	Algorithm-independent machine learning"	Unsupervised learning and clusteringThe course is quite mathematical.  Students enrolling this class are expected to have a good understanding of probability and random variables, both one-dimensional and multi-dimensional, and a good background in linear algebra as well as calculus.  Some of the necessary math will be reviewed at the beginning of the course, but it is only a quick review, not a math course.Grades will be based on homework, tests, and small computer projects.

name.en: Modular Talks by Prestigious Scientific or Industrial Pionee

description.zh: 本課程每學期擬邀請科技或產業界傑出人士5-6位，在其專業領域進行為期2-3週的專題講課；主要是為了拓展博碩士生進入職場前的視野，對年輕學生給予指標式的誘導與激勵。
description.en: Modular serial talks are designed for senior-level or PhD-program postgraduate students. The high-power speakers will be strictly selected and invited either from scientific organizations or from industry. The course aims to broaden students' vision on various professional aspects, as well as to inspire their creactivities both in research and development.

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: 9/19上課(請至三教111電腦教室上課(非同步遠距課程)

description.zh: 電腦結構簡介，電腦介面與標準，量測訊號處理包括溫度與壓力計等，資料收集系統簡介，資料處理簡介，網路簡介及控制機構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to computer structure, computer interface and the interface standards, measurements including temperature and pressure, introduction data acquisition system, introduction to data control, network system, and the computer control mechanisms.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生撰寫及處理各類商用文書之能力，透過各類專業文體的講授及寫作練習，使學生熟悉各類商用文書術語、文體及文件的應用。
description.en: This course aims at developing students' English writing skills in writing English business letters for various occasions; it is intended to familiarize students with business technical terms and varying types of business letters and documents and to increase their ability to apply them in authentic situations.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合資料與創新思維能力以完成論文。本課程主要為應用於電力工程，內容包括：一、 寫作技巧， 二、 智慧收集資料， 三、良好研究特質， 四、 研究的基本類型 五、 電力工程研究方向， 六、 研究倫理， 七、 研究設計練習
description.en: Postgraduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course applies to power engineering and includes: 1. Writing Capacity, 2. Intelligence gathering, 3. Characteristics of good research, 4. Basic types of research, 5 Topics of power system,. 6. Research ethics 7. Research design practice

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.zh: 太陽光電池製作技術與原理
name.en: Solar Cell Manufacturing Technology and Principal

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於太陽能電池製作技術及基本原理的認識。從太陽能電池的工作原理、太陽能電池電極材料的製備、太陽能電池電極（陰極、陽極）的製作、太陽能電池的組裝、太陽能電池界面的分析到太陽能電池效率的量測等讓學生有系統的接觸與太陽能電池相關的各種知識。課程中將提供學生進行太陽能電池的實作。
description.en: The course "Solar Cell Manufacturing Principal and Technology" aims to provide the basic knowledge in the fabrication of solar cells, including the solar cell operation principle, the preparation of solar cell materials, electrode, device assembling, interface analysis, and efficiency measurement. Several experiments related to solar cell technology are also arranged.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to: 1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an examine their economic and technical characteristics. 2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator PV systems, and discuss their operation. 3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show its feasibility and future potential.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。探討材料強度、彈性塑性及建立理論之數學架構，探討金屬的流動性與破壞，及機械行為所須之冶金基礎，金屬成形時其相關冶金及機械因子及機械實驗之冶金變數。
description.en: The Strength of Materials, Elastic and Plastic Behavior of Crystals (Concept of Stress and Strain), Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanisms, Fracture, The Application of Material Tests (Tension, Hardness Torsion, Fracture, Fatigue), Brittle Fracture and Impact Testing, and Fundamentals of Metal Working.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments
